text: 'The labyrinth's guardian is unseen, but present. Beware shadows that think themselves allies.' That voice on the first floor — Void Caster? No one truly knows who she is.
You move well, but chase shadows you cannot grasp.
I've heard that voice before — just a glimpse, nothing more.
Prepare for your delusions to catch you.
Darkness swallows Commander as defeat claims him.
Welcome to the top. I do not guard the Cube — I am what it feared it might become.
So this is the real game.
The world distorts. Echoing whispers fill the air. The true trial begins.
I came for power, but found truth. A thousand minds trapped with me... And Ego doesn't need a Cube. Ego needs us to play.
